body: Hi Anton. 1. Are you making the walls between the zones as AirWalls? exportAirWalls input should take care of what you need. Can you test it on a small model and let me know if it does work fine? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VwTb9tHVOFuIb48T-NB9NkkHDoyFJ6a*fBVsiN5thTAtXf7kFxfbZyQnvnxJ50NnaJbR01VYHLnlkGggvRQYITPbnAUPVB*g/RemoveAirWalls.JPG) 2. It should pass through the window. You need to create a smaller case with a single window to see if it's happening or not.
